explains: v. 茁壮成长，兴旺，繁荣；（尤指在别人觉得困难的时候）以……为乐，可以出色应对

sentences.en: New businesses thrive in this area.
sentences.cn: 新商家在这一地区蓬勃兴起。

sentences.en: Today her company continues to thrive.
sentences.cn: 如今，她的公司继续蓬勃发展。

sentences.en: However, some birds thrive in noisy environments.
sentences.cn: 然而，有些鸟会在嘈杂的环境中茁壮成长。
